story_alola_01_14000/2401_1001_0100_10: Why are you all ganging up on me like this?
story_alola_01_14000/2401_1001_0200_10:
We’ll let you go once we clear you of suspicion,
so just answer us honestly.
story_alola_01_14000/2401_1001_0300_10:
We received a report that Aether Foundation
employees were setting up suspicious equipment
on the beach.
story_alola_01_14000/2401_1001_0400_10:
The president doesn’t know about this. Did you
give that order?
story_alola_01_14000/2401_1001_0500_10: How would I know anything about that?
story_alola_01_14000/2401_1001_0600_10: Who were you on the phone with?
story_alola_01_14000/2401_1001_0700_10: As I said before, that was, ah, the president, yes.
story_alola_01_14000/2401_1001_0800_10:
I have no memory of talking to you on the
phone, recently.
story_alola_01_14000/2401_1001_1200_10:
We have a problem! We just heard that
Ultra Beasts are appearing again!
story_alola_01_14000/2401_1001_1300_10: Guess they don’t want to give us time to talk...
story_alola_01_14000/2401_1001_1400_10: I’ll stay here and take care of this.
story_alola_01_14000/2401_1001_1500_10: Everyone else, please deal with the Ultra Beasts.
